This campy cult classic stars Marc Singer as a powerful warrior seeking revenge against marauding forces, with plenty of action, adventure, and supernatural twists.

With its witty dialogue and lovable characters, I think you'll really enjoy it!

If you're in the mood for something entirely different, "Tombstone" might be up your alley! It's an action-packed Western with some amazing actors like Dana Delany and Powers Boothe - think rugged cowboys and showdowns at high noon
